entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
